Name: Calming Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Teddiursa and Ursaring.  Swap an Ursa-Claw and an Ursa-Fang for a Calming Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
